segments.text: Is our destination the amusement park ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think even though we are adults , it's still a good place for us to relax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to enjoy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want some exciting . Which is more fun , the roller coaster or the ferris wheel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . Here is for enjoying and exciting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , let me think . The roller coaster looks more fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter . We can go to the ferris wheel later .
segments.speaker: S1
